The price of the precious metal is down more than a percent this morning it's been on a losing streak for the last few months. Juli Niemann, an analyst at Smith Moore and company, explains the drop in price.

"}]
description: After a long winning streak, the price of gold has been going down.
teaser: After a long winning streak, the price of gold has been going down.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, August 6, 2013
contentencoded: The price of the precious metal is down more than a percent this morning it's been on a losing streak for the last few months. Juli Niemann, an analyst at Smith Moore and company, explains the drop in price.
title: Gold goes down
